references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the Stable Diffusion model, which is the foundation for DiffPano's single-view text-to-panorama diffusion model.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces the CLIP model, which is used in DiffPano for evaluating the consistency between generated panoramas and their corresponding text descriptions.

references.paper_title: Epidiff: Enhancing multi-view synthesis via localized epipolar-constrained diffusion
references.reason: This paper proposes the epipolar attention module, which inspired DiffPano's spherical epipolar-aware attention module for ensuring the consistency of generated multi-view panoramas.

references.paper_title: BLIP-2: bootstrapping language-image pre-training with frozen image encoders and large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces the BLIP-2 model, which is used in DiffPano for generating text descriptions of the panoramas.

references.paper_title: Matterport3d: Learning from RGB-D data in indoor environments
references.reason: This paper introduces the Matterport3D dataset, which is used in DiffPano for creating a large-scale panoramic video-text dataset.
